mapper.insert: insert into DEALS_BOARD (title, content, books_category_id, isbn, price,email,publish_Date) values (#{title},#{content},#{booksCategoryId},#{isbn},#{price},#{email},#{publishDate})
mapper.update: update DEALS_BOARD set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, books_category_id=#{booksCategoryId}, price=#{price}, updated_datetime=now(), status=#{status} where deal_id=#{dealId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from DEALS_BOARD d join BOOKS_INFO b on d.isbn = b.isbn
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAVORITES_DEALS (email, deal_id, disabled) VALUES (#{email}, #{dealId}, 'N') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE disabled = IF(disabled = 'N', 'Y', 'N'), favorite_datetime = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT d.* FROM DEALS_BOARD d JOIN FAVORITES_DEALS fd ON d.deal_id = fd.deal_id WHERE fd.email = #{email} AND fd.disabled = 'N' ORDER BY fd.favorite_datetime DESC limit #{skip}, #{size}
select count(*) FROM DEALS_BOARD d JOIN FAVORITES_DEALS fd ON d.deal_id = fd.deal_id WHERE fd.email = #{email} AND fd.disabled = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_RESERVATION SET read_time = NOW() WHERE email = #{email} AND read_time IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT d.deal_id, d.title, bi.book_title, bi.book_image_url, br.write_time FROM DEALS_BOARD d INNER JOIN BOARD_RESERVATION br ON br.deal_id = d.deal_id INNER JOIN BOOKS_INFO bi ON d.isbn = bi.isbn WHERE br.email = #{email} AND br.read_time IS NULL AND d.DISABLED = 'N' ORDER BY br.write_time DESC

SELECT bc.books_category_id, bc.books_category_name, SUM(db.view_cnt) AS deals_view_count_sum FROM DEALS_BOARD db JOIN BOOKS_CATEGORIES bc ON db.books_category_id = bc.books_category_id GROUP BY bc.books_category_id ORDER BY SUM(db.view_cnt) DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM DEALS_BOARD WHERE books_category_id = #{booksCategoryId} AND disabled = 'N' AND status = 'Y' AND isbn is NOT NULL
